name: Dark Reflections
description:
Shemira was only twelve years old when she was called back home from boarding school to be there for the death of her mother. Now it is her duty to stand Vigil - to cover the mirrors all around the house with sheets, stop the clocks, and watch over the body of her mother before the funeral, to be sure that nothing ... bad ... takes her away.

However, something goes terribly wrong and her Mother's Spirit ends up trapped in the Mirror World. Now Shemira has to step into the twisted Mirror World and try to find a way to piece the shattered memory of her mother back together and free her from the Mirror World.

Time is running out, and Something out there wants to stop Shemira before she can succeed...
